did.unittitle: New York State Joint Board Legislative Committee on Industrial and Labor Conditions Minutes

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York State Joint Board Legislative Committee on Industrial and Labor Conditions

did.abstract: Minutes of a Hearing of the Joint Legislative Committee on Industrial and Labor Conditions, held in the Assembly Parlor, the Capitol, Albany, NY, on January 28, 1963.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: New York State Joint Board Legislative Committee on Industrial and Labor Conditions Minutes #5723. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: January 28, 1963. Photocopy of typescript minutes, includes copy of proposed bill on "Employee-Management Relations in Public Service." 129 pp.
